cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class represents an individual user, and keeps track of their albums and photos.
    Author:
    Chris Fretz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addPhotoToAlbum

        public int addPhotoToAlbum(java.lang.String name,
                           long date,
                           java.lang.String album)
        Method adds a photo to an already existing album.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of photo you want to add to the album
        date - Date the photo was taken.
        album - Name of album you want to add the photo to.
        Returns:
        An integer which is positive if the operation succeeded, non-positive if it failed, and can take on different positive values depending on the conditions.

      • addPhotoToAlbum

        public int addPhotoToAlbum(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String caption,
                           long date,
                           java.lang.String album)
        Method adds a photo to an already existing album.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the photo to be added.
        caption - The caption of the photo.
        date - The date the photo was taken (or modified in this case).
        album - The album to add the photo to.
        Returns:
        An integer which is positive if the operation succeeded, non-positive if it failed, and can take on different positive values depending on the conditions.
